alert.note: Alert for Wabasha (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 19 at 8:37PM CDT until May 27 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...The Flood Watch continues for the following rivers in Wisconsin... Minnesota... Mississippi River at Wabasha affecting Buffalo and Wabasha Counties. For the Mississippi River...including Lake City, Wabasha, Alma Dam 4, Winona, La Crosse, Lansing, McGregor, Guttenberg Dam 10... flooding is possible. ...FLOOD WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY EVENING TO FRIDAY, MAY 27... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Wabasha. * WHEN...From Sunday evening to Friday, May 27. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, The river affects low lying areas. At 12.5 feet, Flooding occurs in the field west of the grocery store on Hiawatha Drive. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 11.8 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding. Additional river and weather information is available at www.weather.gov/lacrosse. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 445 AM CDT.
